comment._content: That boat is so heavily overloaded and lopsided, the passengers of 'Nevada' might be in Nirvava  sooner rather than later!

comment._content: It certainly looks like an accident waiting to happen - and only four lifebelts!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: I wonder if this is the same vessel...floating casino in 1931 nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16747155 ; rehabilitated as a respectable ferry in 1933 nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16996689

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] I love this story! Good find! I kind of hope that is the vessel's history :) The second article says the rehabilitated NEVADA had seating for 100 passengers, I can see around 80 people on board in this picture so I suppose it is possible.
